message:
Hello guys, I need an urgent help or idea here!

I'm creating a Chrome App and i want to store some data (not in localStorage and sure not in Cookies) how can I achieve that! 

Thanks,
Mohamed

data.message: Try using something like DropBox APIs https://www.dropbox.com/developers/reference/api#files-GET
http://www.html5rocks.com/en/features/storage and there is flash storgae but it depends about your needs

what i need is to store an id along with an URL that the user can't just clear it from cookies or local storage. :S this has to be done Client side! or if there is a way to save these info in the user google account?!
in the client side there is no way that you can protect from changing or removing , you can save it in server side and access the user google account via OAuth
